# ResultantAI


> AI systems that generate revenue, not complexity.


## Agency Services


We build production-ready AI systems for B2B service businesses.


### Voice Agents (from $10K)
AI phone systems that qualify leads, handle objections, and book appointments. Average 23% booking rate. No scripts, no hold music — conversations that convert.


### Automation Systems (from $5K)
Make.com and n8n workflows that eliminate manual processes. Clients save 20+ hours per week.


### AI Safety & Compliance (from $6K)
PII scrubbing, sentiment routing, audit trails. Enterprise-grade security without enterprise pricing. SOC2-ready in 30 days.


## Case Studies


- **Wayne Conn Plumbing**: +$5K/month in recovered revenue, 20+ hours/week saved
- **CisionVision**: 10X ROI in 60 days
- **Adleg**: Marketing audits reduced from 90 minutes to 2 minutes


## AI Gateway (Coming Q1 2026)


Consumption insurance for AI API costs.


### Intelligence Router
Auto-selects the cheapest model that can handle each request. Typical savings: 80-90%.


### Safety Brain
Every request scanned for PII, sentiment issues, compliance red flags. Block or flag before it hits the model.


### Flat-Rate Billing
Predictable monthly costs. Know your budget before you ship.


### Tiers
- Starter: $99/month (50K requests)
- Growth: $299/month (200K requests)
- Scale: $799/month (1M+ requests)


Founding partners get 50% off for life.


## Founder


**Chris Mott** — 3 years building AI systems for agencies. Ships things that work. Documents them so you never need him again.
